summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.0°C) and outside temperature (up 2.3°C).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 3063 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), dew point temperature (up 3.0°C), outside temperature (up 2.3°C), and inside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 412m minimum and 1807m maximum, with an average of 964.8m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 895.8m and 856.9m.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and slight breezes. Possible light showers, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and some sunny spells will occur. Little change in the weather.
